name: Motorcycle stunt track race - a dirt bike racing game
name_original: Motorcycle stunt track race - a dirt bike racing game
description:
The best motocross simulator is here and you are welcome to join the bike frenzy. Have fun dodging obstacles and performing crazy stunts in this motorcycle game.

This is the ultimate motocross contest with incredible stunts like never seen before. Enter the race tracks and finish the task mentioned at the start of each level. Burn over unseen tracks with your sports bike jump through fire blazing rings and more. Fly off the ramp and strike down the containers to pave your way.
Career mode and Freestyle racing both are available.

Features:

10 levels of extreme biking in career mode
Pick the furious & fastest bikes
Freestyle racing with no limits
Thrill of dangerous stunts and steep jumps
Epic dirt bike with real physics stunts
